typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		ProductID as integer,
		Name as string,
		ProductNumber as string,
		Color as string,
		StandardCost as decimal(19,4),
		ListPrice as decimal(19,4),
		Size as string,
		Weight as decimal(8,2),
		ProductCategoryID as integer,
		ProductModelID as integer,
		SellStartDate as timestamp,
		SellEndDate as timestamp,
		DiscontinuedDate as timestamp,
		ThumbNailPhoto as binary,
		ThumbnailPhotoFileName as string,
		rowguid as string,
		ModifiedDate as timestamp,
		SourceFileName as string,
		DateInserted as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'delta',
	container: 'syn-fs',
	folderPath: 'delta/silver/Product') ~> SilverProduct
source(output(
		ProductCategoryID as integer,
		ParentProductCategoryID as integer,
		Name as string,
		rowguid as string,
		ModifiedDate as timestamp,
		SourceFileName as string,
		DateInserted as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'delta',
	container: 'syn-fs',
	folderPath: 'delta/silver/ProductCategory') ~> SilverCategory
source(output(
		ProductModelID as integer,
		Name as string,
		CatalogDescription as string,
		rowguid as string,
		ModifiedDate as timestamp,
		SourceFileName as string,
		DateInserted as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'delta',
	container: 'syn-fs',
	folderPath: 'delta/silver/ ProductModel') ~> SilverModel
source(output(
		TableName as string,
		LastKey as long
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'delta',
	container: 'syn-fs',
	folderPath: 'delta/gold/dimWatermarks') ~> GoldDimWatermarks
source(output(
		ProductID as integer,
		Name as string,
		ProductNumber as string,
		Color as string,
		StandardCost as decimal(19,4),
		ListPrice as decimal(19,4),
		Size as string,
		Weight as decimal(8,2),
		ProductCategoryID as integer,
		ProductModelID as integer,
		SellStartDate as timestamp,
		SellEndDate as timestamp,
		DiscontinuedDate as timestamp,
		ThumbNailPhoto as binary,
		ThumbnailPhotoFileName as string,
		rowguid as string,
		ModifiedDate as timestamp,
		SourceFileName as string,
		DateInserted as timestamp,
		ProductCategory as string,
		ProductModel as string,
		RowSignature as long,
		ProductKey as long
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'delta',
	container: 'syn-fs',
	folderPath: 'delta/gold/DimProduct') ~> GoldDimProduct
SilverProduct, SilverCategory lookup(SilverProduct@ProductCategoryID == SilverCategory@ProductCategoryID,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> LookupCategory
LookupCategory, SilverModel join(SilverProduct@ProductModelID == SilverModel@ProductModelID,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinModel
Join select(mapColumn(
		ProductID = SilverProduct@ProductID,
		Name = SilverProduct@Name,
		ProductNumber = SilverProduct@ProductNumber,
		Color = SilverProduct@Color,
		StandardCost = SilverProduct@StandardCost,
		ListPrice = SilverProduct@ListPrice,
		Size = SilverProduct@Size,
		Weight = SilverProduct@Weight,
		ProductCategoryID = SilverProduct@ProductCategoryID,
		ProductModelID = SilverProduct@ProductModelID,
		SellStartDate = SilverProduct@SellStartDate,
		SellEndDate = SilverProduct@SellEndDate,
		DiscontinuedDate = SilverProduct@DiscontinuedDate,
		ThumbNailPhoto = SilverProduct@ThumbNailPhoto,
		ThumbnailPhotoFileName = SilverProduct@ThumbnailPhotoFileName,
		rowguid = SilverProduct@rowguid,
		ModifiedDate = SilverProduct@ModifiedDate,
		SourceFileName = SilverProduct@SourceFileName,
		DateInserted = SilverProduct@DateInserted,
		ProductCategory = SilverCategory@Name,
		SourceFileName = SilverCategory@SourceFileName,
		ProductModel = SilverModel@Name,
		RowSignature = CalculateSignature@RowSignature
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select
GoldDimWatermarks filter(TableName=="DimProduct") ~> Filter1
Select keyGenerate(output(ProductKey as long),
	startAt: 1L) ~> SurrogateKey1
SurrogateKey1 derive(ProductKey = ProductKey+ toInteger(LastKeyCache#outputs()[1].LastKey)) ~> CalculateKey
CalculateKey derive(TableName = "DimProduct") ~> AddTableName
AddTableName aggregate(groupBy(TableName),
	LastKey = max(ProductKey)) ~> CalculateMaxKey
CalculateMaxKey alterRow(updateIf(TableName=="DimProduct")) ~> AlterRow
JoinModel derive(RowSignature = crc32(256,SilverProduct@Name,ProductNumber,Color,StandardCost,ListPrice,Size,Weight,DiscontinuedDate,SilverCategory@Name,SilverModel@Name)) ~> CalculateSignature
CalculateSignature, GoldDimProduct join(SilverProduct@ProductID == GoldDimProduct@ProductID,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join
CalculateKey sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'delta',
	container: 'syn-fs',
	folderPath: 'delta/gold/DimProduct',
	truncate:true,
	mergeSchema: false,
	autoCompact: false,
	optimizedWrite: false,
	vacuum: 0,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> GoldProduct
Filter1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	store: 'cache',
	format: 'inline',
	output: false,
	saveOrder: 1) ~> LastKeyCache
AlterRow sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'delta',
	container: 'syn-fs',
	folderPath: 'delta/gold/dimWatermarks',
	mergeSchema: false,
	autoCompact: false,
	optimizedWrite: false,
	vacuum: 0,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:true,
	upsertable:true,
	keys:['TableName'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> TargetWatermark
